, I do like your writing style! As for the catechismic style, I believe that was popularized by Donald Rumsfeld . Instead of submitting to interviews with real actual reporters, he just interviewed himself. It would seem to me that she has to do something before she announces to try to fix some of the post-Arizona damage. Or maybe she doesn't even think that way and doesn't see it as damage at all. I think she would consider the damage control already done. She put out her video, she went on Hannity, done deal. On to the announcement. ohsocynical 20 January 2011 8:20 PM

Updated: 01/24/11 4:54 AM Colin Powell said he was not committed to supporting Barack Obama in 2012. Close Colin Powell said on Sunday that he was not committed to supporting Barack Obama or any other candidate in 2012 I'm not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell said on CNN's`` State of the Union`` I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position.''
